amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce spending in the bill by $2,755,000,000 across specified accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 111-18 to reduce spending in this act by $2,755,000,000 across multiple accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 318 (Roll no. 443).
